node.title: Subresource Integrity TagHelper Using ASP.NET Core - Part 1
node.description: Use an ASP.NET Core TagHelper to implement Subresource Integrity (SRI) to ensure that external resources have not been tampered with.

node.title: Securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config
node.description: The web.config file is insecure in the default ASP.NET MVC project template. This post talks you through securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config file.
